item.title: Installation
item.description: Simply follow the standard Hugo Quick Start procedure to get up and running quickly. Detailed instructions can be found below. Install Hugo # You can find specific instructions for your platform in the official Hugo docs. Make sure you are using Hugo version 0.86.1 or later as the theme takes advantage of some of the latest Hugo features. Create a new site # Run the command hugo new site mywebsite to create a new Hugo site in a folder named mywebsite.

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: This section assumes you have already installed the Congo theme. The config files that ship with Congo contain all of the possible settings that the theme recognises. By default, many of these are commented out but you can simply uncomment them to activate or change a specific feature. A few things you need to set for a new installation: # config/_default/config.toml baseURL = "https://your_domain.com" languageCode = "en-AU" title = "My awesome website" It’s also useful to set the author configuration in the config/_default/author.
